body: @mythmon This is ready for review! I've removed the unnecessary parsing, moved the durability seeding to RecipeRunner, and bumped the 'durability value threshold' to 2, as in selfrepair. I think this should fix the issues you had pointed out re: non-durable drivers still executing.
body_text: @mythmon This is ready for review! I've removed the unnecessary parsing, moved the durability seeding to RecipeRunner, and bumped the 'durability value threshold' to 2, as in selfrepair. I think this should fix the issues you had pointed out re: non-durable drivers still executing.
body_html: @mythmon This is ready for review! I've removed the unnecessary parsing, moved the durability seeding to RecipeRunner, and bumped the 'durability value threshold' to 2, as in selfrepair. I think this should fix the issues you had pointed out re: non-durable drivers still executing.
